response.overview: Angel and Lorenzo have been a couple for a long time. They are also centuries old vampires. Angel struggles to accept the end of their relationship and the loneliness of the Covid-19 lockdown makes it even harder. She lures Lorenzo to the Sea Point Promenade - the place where they met at the time - to return some of his belongings. Lorenzo last ate days and is starving to death. He shows up at the Promenade with his new human girlfriend and Angel was definitely not prepared for that.
response.title: Net Ons
